name: ORS  Prisoners With No Visit History
description:
VIS0026 -  Last Modified: 
17/08/2023
This report provides a list of prisoners who have  never had a visit booked at runtime

dataset.name: No Visits
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS TODAY_, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID AS OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, DT_RECEPTION_DATE.MOVEMENT_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE /* when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_CALCULATED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_OVERRIDED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_OVERRIDED_DATE when AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_CALCULATED_DATE is not null then AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_CALCULATED_DATE */ ELSE NULL END AS Last_Rel_Date, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MIN(MOVEMENT_DATE), MIN(MOVEMENT_TIME) FROM OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE DIRECTION_CODE = ('IN') GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) /* Reception Date. End of object10 Nov 2008. First movement with direction IN. Screen:Enquiries/Offender Specifics/External Moves -->Date */) DT_RECEPTION_DATE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('HQU53Y')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_RECEPTION_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('HQU53Y')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = 'BFI') AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID IS NULL)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, DESCRIPTION, TODAY_, AGY_LOC_ID, OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, MOVEMENT_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Movements
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TIME AS MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN ('A0086CE', 'A0165EZ', 'A0168AT', 'A0243EN', 'A0809EM', 'A0971EY', 'A1388EG', 'A2055DT', 'A2067CR', 'A2093EW', 'A2121EG', 'A2142AL', 'A2255EF', 'A2373EZ', 'A2547AG', 'A2563AL', 'A2635EQ', 'A2666EZ', 'A2883AV', 'A3091DN', 'A3938EE', 'A4023AY', 'A4049ER', 'A4084CR', 'A4249DQ', 'A4334EZ', 'A4549CA', 'A4549EF', 'A4673AV', 'A4674DT', 'A4778EZ', 'A4850EZ', 'A5009ET', 'A5266DX', 'A5503EZ', 'A5606EZ', 'A5770CE', 'A6043EZ', 'A6375EZ', 'A6413EZ', 'A6450EC', 'A6693CP', 'A6833EZ', 'A6842AD', 'A6990ET', 'A7038EZ', 'A7212EZ', 'A7251CY', 'A7278EZ', 'A7284EZ', 'A7307ED', 'A7375EZ', 'A7379EZ', 'A7383EZ', 'A7520EZ', 'A7645EZ', 'A7703CQ', 'A7723EZ', 'A7787EZ', 'A7802CE', 'A8071EM', 'A8257EQ', 'A8591AZ', 'A9168EW', 'A9260ED', 'A9421EW', 'A9682EY', 'A9688AN', 'A9705AC', 'A9750AP', 'A9776EX') AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION = 'Admission' AND AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('BFI') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, MOVEMENT_TIME FROM dataset_base_)
